name: GoodHealthTips
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to daily good health tips from Health Sciences South Carolina (HSSC). You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" or "Alexa, what's in the news" to hear a new tip each day. You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

The text, audio, video, and other information (the "Content") provided here is for informational purposes only. The Content is not intended to provide or substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. The Content is not intended to be -- and therefore should not be interpreted as -- recommendation(s) for any specific treatment plan, product, or provider. Use of this Skill does not create a doctor-patient relationship. Any questions regarding individual medical conditions should be directed to a health care professional. 
 
If you have any concerns about your health, consult your physician promptly. Never disregard or delay individual medical advice or care because of something you read or heard here. We strive for timeliness and accuracy of all content; however, we cannot guarantee this. The Site and Content are provided "AS IS." Use of the Site and the Content, and resliance on any information obtained, is at your own risk.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
